metadata.name: Code Executed Via Office Add-in XLL File
metadata.comment: Adversaries may abuse Microsoft Office add-ins to obtain persistence on a compromised system. Office add-ins can be used to add functionality to Office programs

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM script_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 1 AND contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('new-object ')) AND contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('-comobject ')) AND contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('.application')) AND contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('.registerxll')))

output.summary: Adversaries may abuse Microsoft Office add-ins to obtain persistence on a compromised system. Office add-ins can be used to add functionality to Office programs
